title: March Jobs Report Preview, Biden’s Infrastructure Plan
itunes:title: March Jobs Report Preview, Biden’s Infrastructure Plan
description:
Amesh Adalja, Senior Scholar at the Center for Health Security at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, provides a coronavirus and vaccine update. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Sarah Frier discuss the story “Facebook Is Letting Anti-Vaxxers Scare Women From Covid Shots.” Former U.S. Deputy Secretary of Labor Chris Lu joins with a March jobs report preview and thoughts on the President Biden’s infrastructure plan. And we Drive to the Close with John Traynor, CIO at People's United Advisors.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
